title: Design project dashboard UI
description: Create a modern, responsive dashboard layout with task overview and activity feed.

title: Set up backend API
description: Implement CRUD endpoints for tasks using Node.js and Express.

title: Implement authentication
description: Add JWT-based authentication and role management for users.

title: Integrate database
description: Connect MongoDB and create task and user schemas with validation.

title: Build task creation form
description: Create a React form with validation for adding new tasks to the system.

title: Implement task filters and sorting
description: Add filtering by status, priority, and deadline, and implement sorting options.

title: Add drag-and-drop for tasks
description: Enable drag-and-drop functionality between task columns (To Do, In Progress, Done).

title: Create user profile page
description: Add profile editing, avatar upload, and task statistics section.

title: Implement notifications system
description: Add in-app and email notifications for deadlines and task updates.

title: Polish UI and deploy MVP
description: Fix UI inconsistencies, test responsiveness, and deploy the MVP to production.
